pageProps.postData:
Getting Started

This is the documentation for Setu's NPM UPI Deep Links module.

It is used to interact with Setu's UPI Deep Link APIs efficiently. It acts as a wrapper has predictable resource-oriented naming convention; it returns JSON-encoded responses with HTTP response codes, and response body.

Installation

This package can be installed like -

npm i @setu/upi-deep-links

or by doing this

yarn add @setu/upi-deep-links

Configuration

Once installed, you can instantiate the module by running

const SetuUPIDeepLink = require('@setu/upi-deep-links');

let setu = new SetuUPIDeepLink({
    schemeId: 'YOUR SCHEME ID',
    jwtSecret: 'YOUR JWT SECRET',
    setuProductInstanceId: 'YOUR PRODUCT INSTANCE ID',
    mode: "PRODUCTION" or "SANDBOX" // default - "SANDBOX"
});

After configuration, refer to usage to know more about the underlying methods and how to implement it.

If you do not have your schemeId or jwtSecret or setuProductInstanceId please contact support.
